name: Sun
quote: I'm actually a star but the gang asked me to be here

name: Venus
quote: I'm hot and I know it

name: Earth
quote: Some call me 'Earth'.  My name is actually Garth

name: Mars
quote: Hey, aren't you guys coming over?  What's taking so long?

name: Jupiter
quote: The key to gaining mass?  Protein and sleep

name: Saturn
quote: Let me spin some of these disks real quick.  Remix!

name: Uranus
quote: I lean AND I have rings!

name: Pluto
quote: Hey guys!  Don't forget about me!

name: The end
quote:
Contact me at chrislwebdev@gmail.com
to tell me Pluto isn't a planet
